verses.text: How dearly loved \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* place \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* live, \nd Lord\nd* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* hosts!

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w long|strong="H4100"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* yearn \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* courts \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. Now heart \w and|strong="H3068"\w* flesh cry \w for|strong="H3068"\w* joy \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* living \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Even|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sparrow \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H1571"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w home|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* swallow \w a|strong="H3068"\w* nest, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w lay|strong="H5315"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w* young, near \w your|strong="H3068"\w* altar, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hosts, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* king \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
Happy those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* live \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, praising \w you|strong="H4672"\w* evermore. \qs Selah\qs*
Happy \w those|strong="H3427"\w* whose strength \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H1004"\w*, \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* pilgrim hearts.

\w As|strong="H3824"\w* \w they|strong="H3824"\w* pass through \w the|strong="H5797"\w* valley \w of|strong="H3824"\w* tears, \w they|strong="H3824"\w* make it \w a|strong="H3068"\w* place \w of|strong="H3824"\w* fountains, clothed \w with|strong="H3824"\w* \w the|strong="H5797"\w* blessings \w of|strong="H3824"\w* early rain.

\w From|strong="H5674"\w* rampart \w to|strong="H5674"\w* rampart \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w they|strong="H1571"\w* march, till \w at|strong="H1571"\w* last God reveals \w himself|strong="H5844"\w* \w in|strong="H1571"\w* Zion.
\nd Lord\nd*, God \w of|strong="H2428"\w* \w hosts|strong="H2428"\w*, hear \w my|strong="H7200"\w* prayer, attend, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H2428"\w* Jacob. \qs Selah\qs*
Behold, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w our|strong="H3068"\w* defender, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H3068"\w* upon \w your|strong="H3068"\w* anointed,

\w for|strong="H6440"\w* better \w a|strong="H3068"\w* single day \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* courts \w than|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w own|strong="H6440"\w* chambers: better stand \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* door \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* God \w than|strong="H6440"\w* live \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* tents \w of|strong="H6440"\w* ungodliness,

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* 
d Lord
d* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* sun \w and|strong="H3117"\w* shield, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* 
d Lord
d* gives grace \w and|strong="H3117"\w* glory. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* withholds no \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w thing|strong="H2896"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* blameless.

\nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hosts, \w happy|strong="H2896"\w* \w those|strong="H1980"\w* whose trust \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.
